mapper.sql: g_id, g_ts_id, g_peacetime, g_midterm, g_presentation, g_check, g_total
mapper.select: select *,t_topicselect.id tsId,t_topicselect.status tsStatus,t_student.name sName,t_student.department sDepartment,t_student.status sStatus,t_topic.id tpId,t_topic.name tpName,t_topic.department tpDepartment,t_topic.status tpStatus from t_grade,t_topicselect,t_student,t_topic where t_grade.g_ts_id = t_topicselect.id and t_topicselect.s_sno = t_student.sno and t_topicselect.tp_id = t_topic.id and t_topicselect.status = 1 and t_grade.g_id = #{gId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select *,t_topicselect.id tsId,t_topicselect.status tsStatus,t_student.name sName,t_student.department sDepartment,t_student.status sStatus,t_topic.id tpId,t_topic.name tpName,t_topic.department tpDepartment,t_topic.status tpStatus from t_grade,t_topicselect,t_student,t_topic where t_grade.g_ts_id = t_topicselect.id and t_topicselect.s_sno = t_student.sno and t_topicselect.tp_id = t_topic.id and t_topicselect.status = 1 and t_topicselect.t_tno = #{tno,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select *,t_topicselect.id tsId,t_topicselect.status tsStatus,t_student.name sName,t_student.department sDepartment,t_student.status sStatus,t_topic.id tpId,t_topic.name tpName,t_topic.department tpDepartment,t_topic.status tpStatus from t_grade,t_topicselect,t_student,t_topic where t_grade.g_ts_id = t_topicselect.id and t_topicselect.s_sno = t_student.sno and t_topicselect.tp_id = t_topic.id and t_topicselect.status = 1 and t_grade.g_ts_id = #{gTsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_grade (g_id, g_ts_id, g_peacetime, g_midterm, g_presentation, g_check, g_total) values (#{gId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gTsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gPeacetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gMidterm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gPresentation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gCheck,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_grade
g_id,
g_ts_id,
g_peacetime,
g_midterm,
g_presentation,
g_check,
g_total,
#{gId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gTsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gPeacetime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gMidterm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gPresentation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gCheck,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update t_grade
g_ts_id = #{gTsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
g_peacetime = #{gPeacetime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
g_midterm = #{gMidterm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
g_presentation = #{gPresentation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
g_check = #{gCheck,jdbcType=INTEGER},
g_total = #{gTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where g_id = #{gId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_grade set g_ts_id = #{gTsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, g_peacetime = #{gPeacetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, g_midterm = #{gMidterm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, g_presentation = #{gPresentation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, g_check = #{gCheck,jdbcType=INTEGER}, g_total = #{gTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER} where g_id = #{gId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_grade tg WHERE tg.g_ts_id= (SELECT tps.id FROM t_topicselect tps WHERE tps.s_sno=#{sno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and tps.status=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select ts.name tsname,ts.sno,ts.classes,tp.name tpname,tr.name trname,tg.g_peacetime,tg.g_midterm,tg.g_presentation,tg.g_check,tg.g_total from t_teacher tr,t_topic tp,t_student ts,t_topicselect tps ,t_grade tg WHERE ts.sno=tps.s_sno and tps.t_tno=tr.tno and tps.tp_id=tp.id and tg.g_ts_id=tps.id GROUP BY tg.g_total having tg.g_total BETWEEN #{min,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{max,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY tg.g_total desc

select ts.name tsname,ts.sno,ts.classes,tp.name tpname,tr.name trname,tg.g_peacetime,tg.g_midterm,tg.g_presentation,tg.g_check,tg.g_total from t_teacher tr,t_topic tp,t_student ts,t_topicselect tps ,t_grade tg WHERE ts.sno=tps.s_sno and tps.t_tno=tr.tno and tps.tp_id=tp.id and tg.g_ts_id=tps.id and tr.name like concat('%',#{tno},'%')
